short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a randomized slideshow of photos from a selected folder as if physical photos thrown on the table.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple gallery which shuffle shows images from local folder imitating a cool slideshow feature Picasa used to have years ago: displaying your images as if they are thrown on the table one after another.

Hower mouse to upper left of the window and you will see interface. Just point extension to a folder and it will load all images from this folder and  its subfolders and will start showing slidehshow.

You can modify self explaining parameters.

Thats it.

My usecase: Run it in chrome tab, F11 for fullscreen, chromecast tab to a TV - have a cool digital photoframe from your tv. Ctrl+tab to leave the fullscreen slideshow tab, F11 to get your tabs normal again. (incative slideshow tab stays fullscreen and is chromcasted normally)
